attributes.action: Look after Englands own people before immigrants and asylum seekers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Thousands of asylum seekers and illegal immigrants are entering the UK every week. 
The government, gives them money for clothes, food, housing, cars and all the benefits under the sun.
The government should think about putting the British people first, who have no homes, homeless people, the unemployed. 
PUT OUR PEOPLE FIRST!!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
